title: Gene expression metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for processing metrics of a gene expression library.

estimated_number_of_cells.title: Estimated number of cells
estimated_number_of_cells.description: Number of barcodes associated with cell-containing partitions, estimated from UMI counts.

mean_reads_per_cell.title: Mean reads per cell
mean_reads_per_cell.description: Total number of reads divided by estimated number of cells.

median_genes_per_cell.title: Median genes per cell
median_genes_per_cell.description: Median number of genes detected (with nonzero UMI counts) across cell-associated barcodes.

valid_barcodes.title: Valid barcodes
valid_barcodes.description: Percentage of reads with cell barcodes that match the whitelist.

reads_mapped_confidently_to_transcriptom.title: Reads mapped confidently to the transcriptome
reads_mapped_confidently_to_transcriptom.description: Percentage of reads mapped to a unique gene in the transcriptome with high mapping quality score.

reads_mapped_confidently_to_exonic_regio.title: Reads mapped confidently to exonic regions
reads_mapped_confidently_to_exonic_regio.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the exonic regions of the genome with high mapping quality score.

reads_mapped_confidently_to_intronic_reg.title: Reads mapped confidently to intronic regions
reads_mapped_confidently_to_intronic_reg.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the intronic regions of genome with a high mapping quality score.

reads_mapped_confidently_to_intergenic_r.title: Reads mapped confidently to intergenic regions
reads_mapped_confidently_to_intergenic_r.description: Percentage of reads that mapped to the intergenic regions of the genome with a high mapping quality score.

sequencing_saturation.title: Sequencing saturation
sequencing_saturation.description: Percentage of reads originating from an already-observed UMI.

q30_bases_in_barcode.title: Q30 bases in barcode
q30_bases_in_barcode.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the cell barcode sequences.

q30_bases_in_rna_read.title: Q30 bases in rna read
q30_bases_in_rna_read.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the RNA read sequence

q30_bases_in_sample_index.title: Q30 bases in sample index
q30_bases_in_sample_index.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the sample index sequences.

q30_bases_in_umi.title: Q30 bases in umi
q30_bases_in_umi.description: Fraction of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the UMI sequences.

fraction_reads_in_cells.title: Fraction reads in cells
fraction_reads_in_cells.description: Percentage of cell-barcoded, confidently mapped reasds with cell-associated barcodes.

total_genes_detected.title: Total genes detected
total_genes_detected.description: The number of genes with at least one UMI count in any cell.

median_umi_counts_per_cell.title: Median umi counts per cell
median_umi_counts_per_cell.description: The median number of total UMI counts across all cell-associated barcodes.

antibody_capture_metrics.title: Antibody capture metrics
antibody_capture_metrics.description: The antibody capture metrics that is also associated with the feature expression matrix from which this gene expression metrics was generated.

doublet_rate.title: Doublet rate
doublet_rate.description: The rate that doublets were detected in the associated data
